title: MATCHMAKING

embed.description: easy, fast, free image and file hosting

body:
this Yi literally fked my game, this was my placments game right before riot game us 1 more chance,
i was really happy, then i get matched with this fking scrub, he Instalocks yi top and fed Jayce
i tried to carry, but we lost in the end cause he afked, this is one of the reasons i hate league riot keep matching me with this scrubs/trash players

replies.body:
Being bad or having an off game isn't a bannable, nor reportable offence. People seriously need to get over the fact that their teammates are human just like them, and as humans, we make mistakes. I know this has been said a million times, but no one is perfect.

I can't speak for everyone here, but most of the time I have decent teammates that can carry their own weight, and 1/10 I'm matched with someone who isn't having the best game.

So basically, my message to players such as yourself is; shit happens, time to move on, and play the game.
